article_title: The latest developments in Israel and Gaza.
sentence: We're  pausing  our  live  coverage  shortly,  here  are  the  latest  developments  in  the  Israel-Gaza  war:  Three  Israeli  hostages  mistakenly  killed  by  Israeli  troops  in  Gaza  on  Friday  were  shot  after  they  were  mis-identified  as  "terrorists",  the  IDF  has  said.

article_title: The latest developments in Israel and Gaza.
sentence: Meanwhile,  reports  say  dozens  of  people  have  been  killed  in  Israeli  air  strikes  in  Jabalia  in  northern  Gaza,  with  many  civilians  said  to  be  trapped  under  rubble.
